name: FF Racing Car: Cup King Speed
name_original: FF Racing Car: Cup King Speed
description:
Take your drifting game to the next level - reach mind-blowing speed in a selection of tuned street racing cars.Get right into the race games thanks to extremely easy to learn controls - but don't think that this game is as simple to master! Expect hours of engaging fun.
Featuring:
- Crazy powerful cars for you to pick
- A selection of beautiful race tracks
- Mind-blowing speed boosting nitrous
- Drifts that will make your head spin around
- Easy to learn, hard to master mechanics
